nodes.bodyText: This is fixed by now though
Merge with comment above, it looks very weird floating by itself here

nodes.diffHunk:

 package org.eclipse.xtext.generator.trace
 
-import java.util.List
-import org.eclipse.xtend.lib.annotations.Accessors
 import org.eclipse.xtext.generator.trace.TraceRegionToStringTester.Location

@@ -10,12 +10,8 @@ package org.eclipse.xtext.resource.containers
 
 import com.google.inject.Inject
 import com.google.inject.Provider

nodes.bodyText: Put the constructor as first method?
